billing_data.subject: Peter, introducing Energy Insights - to help you reduce energy waste

CUSTOMERDETAILS.CDSUBJECT: Peter, introducing Energy Insights - to help you reduce energy waste

WELCOME.WELFIELD1: Hi Peter. We’re excited to introduce Energy Insights, a powerful new service offering you greater visibility and helping you to take control of your electricity usage. Best of all? It's totally free.
WELCOME.WELFIELD5: We’ve developed smart technology that estimates how much energy you use in your home on heating, cooling, lighting, laundry, standby and more.
WELCOME.WELHEADER1: How we estimate your electricity use by appliance
WELCOME.WELFIELD10: We take data from your smart meter, home profile info, as well as weather, and other data to generate an estimated breakdown of how different appliances used energy in your home. These appliance usage estimates won’t be 100% accurate, and may differ from your actual consumption and costs. Check out our
WELCOME.WELFIELD15: for info on how we estimate your breakdown.
WELCOME.WELFIELD20: We’ll send you two Energy Insights emails each bill period. You’ll receive the first halfway through, and the second a few days after your electricity bill. The first email will include your cost-to-date and projected bill, to allow you time to adjust your usage before your bill is issued. The second email will contain insights into how you used energy for the period. You’ll also get personalised tips to help you reduce energy waste and save money.
WELCOME.WELFIELD25: We're thrilled to bring you more ways to take control of your energy usage now, and into the future.

billing_data.subject: Introducing Energy Insights – a new service from AGL

CUSTOMERDETAILS.CDSUBJECT: Introducing Energy Insights – a new service from AGL

WELCOME.WELFIELD1: Energy Insights, is a new service that estimates how much electricity you use in your home on heating, cooling, lighting, laundry, standby and more.
WELCOME.WELHEADER1: How we estimate your electricity use by appliance
WELCOME.WELFIELD10: We use your smart meter data, home profile information, as well as weather information, and other data to generate an estimated breakdown of where you used electricity in your home. Appliance usage estimates are not 100% accurate, and may differ from actual consumption and costs. See our
WELCOME.WELFIELD15: for more information about how we calculate these estimates, the benefits, and limitations of this service.
WELCOME.WELFIELD20: We'll send you two Energy Insights emails each bill period. You'll receive the first halfway through, and the second a few days after your electricity bill. The first email will include your cost-to-date and projected bill, to allow you time to adjust your usage before your bill is issued. The second email will contain insights into how you used energy for the period. You'll also get tailored energy saving tips.

WELCOME.WELFIELD1: Hi Terri Ellen. We’re excited to introduce Energy Insights, a powerful new service offering you greater visibility and helping you to take control of your electricity usage. Best of all? It's totally free.
WELCOME.WELFIELD5: We’ve developed smart technology that estimates how much energy you use in your home on heating, cooling, lighting, laundry, standby and more.
WELCOME.WELHEADER1: How we estimate your electricity use by appliance
WELCOME.WELFIELD10: We take data from your smart meter, home profile info, as well as weather, and other data to generate an estimated breakdown of how different appliances used energy in your home. These appliance usage estimates won’t be 100% accurate, and may differ from your actual consumption and costs. Check out our
WELCOME.WELFIELD15: for info on how we estimate your breakdown.
WELCOME.WELFIELD20: We’ll send you two Energy Insights emails each bill period. You’ll receive the first halfway through, and the second a few days after your electricity bill. The first email will include your cost-to-date and projected bill, to allow you time to adjust your usage before your bill is issued. The second email will contain insights into how you used energy for the period. You’ll also get personalised tips to help you reduce energy waste and save money.
WELCOME.WELFIELD25: We're thrilled to bring you more ways to take control of your energy usage now, and into the future.

WELCOME.WELHEADER1: How we estimate your electricity use by appliance
WELCOME.WELFIELD10: We use your smart meter data, home profile information, as well as weather information, and other data to generate an estimated breakdown of where you used electricity in your home. Appliance usage estimates are not 100% accurate, and may differ from actual consumption and costs. See our
WELCOME.WELFIELD15: for more information about how we calculate these estimates, the benefits, and limitations of this service.
WELCOME.WELFIELD20: We'll send you two Energy Insights emails each bill period. You'll receive the first halfway through, and the second a few days after your electricity bill. The first email will include your cost-to-date and projected bill, to allow you time to adjust your usage before your bill is issued. The second email will contain insights into how you used energy for the period. You'll also get tailored energy saving tips.
WELCOME.WELFIELD25: Click
WELCOME.WELFIELD30: to no longer receive Energy Insights emails.

BILLDETAILS.BDLINE1: Your mid bill Energy Insights update
BILLDETAILS.BDLINE10: Hi Donna, here's an estimate of your energy costs half way through this bill period.

DISAGG.DAHEADER1: Your estimated energy use by appliance
DISAGG.DAHEADER2: We estimate that 24% of your usage went towards pool pump.*

CHARGES.CHARGES10: This is the cost of getting energy to your home.

CHARGEEXPL.CHARGES15: *We use your smart meter data, home profile info, weather, and other data to estimate your energy costs by appliance. Appliance usage estimates are not 100% accurate, and may differ from actual consumption and costs. You can
CHARGEEXPL.CHARGES40: about each appliance category and how they're calculated.

CUSTINSIGHTS.INSHEADERTIP: Fiddle with your pool pump settings. Usually, they’re set to filter the entire pool twice a day, which is totally unnecessary. By reducing your run time, you can still keep your pool clean and save on your energy bill.

INSIGHT.INSIGHT2: 35% of your electricity was used in the evening between 6pm and 12am.
INSIGHT.INSIGHT3: You used an estimated 38% more electricity on your pool pump than similar homes†.

HOMEPROFILE.HPFIELD1: Complete your home profile for a more personalised breakdown of your energy use.
HOMEPROFILE.HPFIELD15: Your feedback will help us make this service even better.

ADDITIONALINFO.AIFIELD5: †We compare your energy usage by appliance category to a group of homes that share characteristics that typically lead to similar energy needs. These include: home type and size, number of people living in the home, type of appliances, and postcode. See our
ADDITIONALINFO.AIFIELD7: for more information how we estimate your similar homes comparison.
ADDITIONALINFO.AIFIELD10: +Cost to date includes your usage charges and other items on your bill such as supply charges, concessions, and discounts. It does not include carry forward balances, Pay on Time discounts or manual adjustments. Refer to your bill for more detail of charges payable.
ADDITIONALINFO.AIFIELD15: ^Your projected bill is calculated using your historical data to estimate your average daily energy usage until the end of your current bill period. It is a projection which includes your usage charges and other items on your bill such as supply charges, concessions, and discounts. It does not include carry forward balances, Pay on Time discounts or manual adjustments.
ADDITIONALINFO.AIFIELD25: to manage your Energy Insights email preferences in My Account.

WELCOME.WELFIELD5: We’ve developed smart technology that estimates how much energy you use in your home on heating, cooling, lighting, laundry, standby and more.
WELCOME.WELHEADER1: How we estimate your electricity use by appliance
WELCOME.WELFIELD10: We take data from your smart meter, home profile info, as well as weather, and other data to generate an estimated breakdown of how different appliances used energy in your home. These appliance usage estimates won’t be 100% accurate, and may differ from your actual consumption and costs. Check out our
WELCOME.WELFIELD15: for info on how we estimate your breakdown.
WELCOME.WELFIELD20: We’ll send you two Energy Insights emails each bill period. You’ll receive the first halfway through, and the second a few days after your electricity bill. The first email will include your cost-to-date and projected bill, to allow you time to adjust your usage before your bill is issued. The second email will contain insights into how you used energy for the period. You’ll also get personalised tips to help you reduce energy waste and save money.
WELCOME.WELFIELD25: We're thrilled to bring you more ways to take control of your energy usage now, and into the future.
